name: Just Merge It
description:
JUST MERGE IT

is a short platformer game made for ScoreSpace Jam #14

Main of the game goal is to... well get to the finish. Easy, right? "Where is the catch?" you might ask... well you can use your body as a block and walk on it, but only in certain areas.

Also, there is a timer and leaderboards in the end. PLEASE DO NOT CHEAT!

Let's see who is the fastest GAMER!
